t: Terra Thread | Ethical Brand Directory
s: March 11, 2022 - Terra Thread is the one-stop-shop for organic & fair-trade backpacks, totes and travel bags. With sustainable brands occupying only an estimated 1% of the fashion industry, Terra Thread wants to pave the way to a future in which fashion is fair, safe and inclusive.
